panels.description: Failures on CircleCI runs on the master branch

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at, 30m),
       count(*) as "failing jobs"
FROM status_event
WHERE state != "pending"
  AND state != "success"
  AND $__timeFilter(updated_at)
  AND json_unquote(json_extract(branches, "$[0].name")) = "master"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(updated_at,30m)

panels.title: CircleCI/Jenkins Master Failures

panels.description: Failures on CircleCI runs on the master branch

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at, 30m),
       count(*) as "failing jobs"
FROM status_event
WHERE state != "pending"
  AND state != "success"
  AND $__timeFilter(updated_at)
  AND json_unquote(json_extract(branches, "$[0].name")) = "master"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(updated_at,30m)

panels.title: CircleCI Master Failures

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1h),
  count(*) AS "PRs created"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(created_at,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(closed_at,1h),
  count(*) AS "PRs created"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(closed_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(closed_at,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,1h),
  count(*) as "Commits"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(closed_at,1h),
  count(*) AS "PRs created"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(closed_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(closed_at,1h)

select
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/master'
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

panels.description: Note: Bundled commits show up as a single revert

targets.rawSql:
select count(*) as "num_reverts"
from push_event
where ref = 'refs/heads/master'
    and head_commit_message like "Revert D%"
    and $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at);

panels.title: # Reverts

targets.rawSql:
select
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/viable/strict' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

select
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/nightly' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

panels.description: Failures across all sources (commits, PRs, nightlies)

targets.rawSql:
select context, count(*) as "num_failures"
from status_event 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) and state!="pending" and state!="success"
GROUP BY context
ORDER BY COUNT(*) desc;

panels.title: Top Failing Jobs

targets.rawSql:
select push_event.ref,
    status_event.sha,
    (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(status_event.updated_at)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from status_event
    inner join push_event on sha = push_event.head_commit_id
where push_event.ref = "refs/heads/master"
    and context like "ci/circleci: pytorch_python_doc_build"
    and state = "success"
order by updated_at desc
limit 1;

select push_event.ref,
    status_event.sha,
    (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(status_event.updated_at)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from status_event
    inner join push_event on sha = push_event.head_commit_id
where push_event.ref = "refs/heads/nightly"
    and context like "ci/circleci: pytorch_python_doc_build"
    and state = "success"
order by updated_at desc
limit 1;

SELECT
  author_association,
  count(*) AS "PR Count"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY author_association
ORDER BY created_at

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "cancelled"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'cancelled'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "success"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'success'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "failure"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'failure'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "skipped"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'skipped'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "action_required"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'action_required'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

select starred_at as "time",
    pk_id+50339 as "star num" -- add the offset of stars to when we started recording events
from star_event
where action = "created" and $__timeFilter(starred_at);

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "success"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'success'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "failure"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'failure'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sync_last_update_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "completed"
FROM workflow_job_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) AND
  action = 'completed'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(sync_last_update_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sync_last_update_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "queued"
FROM workflow_job_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) AND
  action = 'queued'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(sync_last_update_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sync_last_update_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "started"
FROM workflow_job_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) AND
  action = 'started'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(sync_last_update_at,10m)

alert.message: Nightly hasn't been updated in over a day
alert.name: Last nightly update alert

targets.rawSql:
select
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() as "time",
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/nightly' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

select
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() as "time",
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/viable/strict' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;
